whyMe.title: Why me
whyMe.description: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Maybe you are passionate about coding? Highlight your motivation for professional growth and continuous learning. Explain your key skills and passion for coding.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.bottomText: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

polloLoco.title: Pollo Loco
polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

testimonials.title: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me

noah.name: Noah Mueller
noah.quote: Marcus had IQ develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members.He is a reliable and friendly person.

evelyn.name: Evelyn Marx
evelyn.quote: He is a trustworthy teammate and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.

james.name: James Rugman
james.quote: He is a reliable and friendly person. Work is structured way and write a clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Express interest in contributing to a new project.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.privacyText: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
